name: RES_CAT_INT_CMTS
description: This table contains test-level result internal category comments.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RES_INT_CMT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the test-level result internal category comment.
